Parameters.Name: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response without Data.SimpleItem "External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Reason="Other"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with Data.SimpleItem "External"
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Reason="CredentialNotEnabled"

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with Data.SimpleItem "External" in Event
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token. Notification without Data.SimpleItem.Name="External" even there's Data.SimpleItemDescription.Name="External" in event.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Incorrect response without Data.SimpleItemDescription "External" in event
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with one token Notification with Data.SimpleItem.Name="External" even there's no Data.SimpleItemDescription.Name="External" in event.

Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-9-1-14 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS DENIED TO ANONYMOUS EVENT
Test.Name: Correct response with more than one token
Test.Description: DUT returns GetAccessPointInfoList with 4 tokens 2 Access Points with Capabilities.AnonymousAccess = “true”
